sections.title: Tag Index
sections.content: This index organizes all documents in the Global Memory Bank by tags, with tags grouped into logical categories.

sections.title: Tag Categories
sections.content:
Tags are organized into the following categories to improve navigation and discoverability:

1. **Project Foundation** - Tags related to project overview, summaries, and general project information
2. **Design & Architecture** - Tags related to system design, architecture patterns, and design decisions
3. **Implementation & Technology** - Tags related to code implementation, tech stack, and dependencies
4. **Documentation & Guides** - Tags related to user guides, references, and glossaries
5. **Testing & Quality** - Tags related to testing strategies, QA, and TDD
6. **Version & Releases** - Tags related to versions, releases, and changelogs
7. **Infrastructure & Operations** - Tags related to CI/CD, workflows, and automation
8. **Internationalization & Localization** - Tags related to i18n, l10n, and templates
9. **Refactoring & Technical Debt** - Tags related to refactoring, technical debt, and improvements
10. **Meta & Miscellaneous** - Tags related to meta information, indices, and other miscellaneous content

sections.title: Tag Map
sections.content:

```json
  "Project Foundation": ["overview", "project", "summary"],
  "Design & Architecture": ["architecture", "design", "domain", "models", "document-model", "decision", "system-design"],
  "Implementation & Technology": ["implementation", "tech-stack", "infrastructure", "dependencies", "typescript", "clean-code"],
  "Documentation & Guides": ["documentation", "guide", "glossary", "terminology", "definitions", "standards", "best-practices", "reference"],
  "Testing & Quality": ["testing", "test", "integration-test", "integration-tests", "qa", "tdd", "e2e", "controller"],
  "Version & Releases": ["v2", "version-2", "v2-0", "release", "changelog", "pr", "decisions"],
  "Infrastructure & Operations": ["ci-cd", "github-actions", "automation", "workflows", "cli", "commands"],
  "Internationalization & Localization": ["i18n", "l10n", "template"],
  "Refactoring & Technical Debt": ["refactoring", "tech-debt", "migration", "policy", "markdown", "json"],
  "Meta & Miscellaneous": ["meta", "index", "memory-bank", "navigation", "context", "mcp", "tag", "troubleshooting", "errors"]

```

sections.title: Using This Index
sections.content:
This index can be used in several ways:

1. **Browse by category**: Find a relevant category from the sections above and explore related tags
2. **Browse by tag**: Find a specific tag in the tag map and see which category it belongs to
3. **Search for documents**: Use a tag to find documents with that tag in the global memory bank

For a more comprehensive guide to navigating the Global Memory Bank, see the consolidated meta information document at `meta/consolidated-memory-bank-meta.json`.
